trends: There has been one other sighting in Madison
There were no other sightings in Madison on or around July 14th 1965
divs: Sighting DetailsI AM FINALLY REPORTING THIS JUST FOR THE RECORD.mY FRIEND & i WERE SITTING ON THE BEACH IN MADISON,CT.WE WERE ABOUT 10-12YRS OLD.WE WERE LOOKING OUT OVER THE WATER & SAW A SLOW MOVING DISC COMING CLOSER & CLOSER TO WHERE WE WERE SITTING.THERE WAS NO NOISE AT ALL COMING FROM THE CRAFT WHICH WAS CLOSE ENOUGH TO HAVE HEARD SOME KIND OF PROPULSION.DISC SHAPED WITH SMALL WINDOWS AROUND IT.AS WE WATCHED THIS CRAFT GLIDE TO OUR ABOUT 2:OO POSITION IT SUDDENLY TOOK OFF FAST VERY FAST LEAVING FOR A SECOND OR TWO A LIGHT TRAIL.BEFORE WE COULD MOVE TWO FIGHTER JETS CAME SCREAMING FOLLOWING THE SAME TRAJECTORY AS THE CRAFT.THEIR NOISE SCARED US BECAUSE WE KNEW WHAT THEY WERE CHASING.THEN WE WERE COLLECTED BY THE "NANNY" & TOLD TO GET BACK TO THE HOUSE.IT WAS A LONG TIME AGO I WILL NEVER FORGET IT & I'VE BEEN LLOKING EVER SINCE.I KNOW WHAT IT WAS HENCE THIS REPORT TO PEOPLE WHO ALSO KNOW WHAT'S GOING ON.IT WAS A LIFE CHANGING EVENT FOR ME.THIS FIELD REALLY IS MY PASSION & HAS BEEN SINCE THAT EVENING.THANKS TO MUFON FOR BEING..& TO YOU WHO LISTENED
Summary: SAW LOW GLIDING OBJECT CLEARLY PASS BY BEACH NO NOISE
